website_summaries.verdict: A pack of balls with great quality, but with slightly different features from some comparable Titleist balls.
pros: The Pro V1 balls are soft with lower height, less iron spin, and less short game spin
cons: Pricey ball, so not ideal for the casual golfer

website_summaries.verdict: Don't let a few quality control complaints stop you, as these Titleist balls are constructed to provide impressive control and distance that make them a favorite choice of serious golfers.
pros: Earn praise for consistent performance, thanks to the multi-component construction with urethane covers that deliver excellent distance and controlled spin making them popular balls among those who love the game
cons: Some quality control issues have been reported, as a few consumers received refurbished or faulty balls resulting in a few authenticity concerns

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a Pro V1 should be only yellow/green. Surprised at how durable the ball holds up. I was expecting the color to scratch during play, but 1 ball lasted three rounds until a lake took it from me......Got these and the TW Bridgestone ball. Not even close IMO. HDCP 2.4, Swing speed 103, so I kinda know what I am talking about. Will buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - The balls I received are genuine Titleist Pro V1 golf balls in the original packaging so I got exactly what I paid for. - The Pro V1 itself is the best ball on the market as of the end of 2019. I knew that before I bought it. - The price I paid is what I expected to pay for a tour quality ball. Cons: - Tour quality balls like the Pro V1 are expensive and therefore you'll be annoyed if you lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Scimajor

customer_reviews.title: Golf balls are not as described
customer_reviews.text: These were described as New with "High Play Numbers". This should have been white with a 5, 6, 7 or 8 in the four sleeves of balls in the case. They were not. In fact, the balls looked as if they had been replaced and each box was taped shut. The balls delivered were pink, all with number 1 only. Wrong numbers, wrong color, re-boxed. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: What Can I Say.....Simply the Best!!
customer_reviews.text: As my headline says the new Pro V1 are the best in overall performance. Yes the price sucks but that's the way it is
customer_reviews.author: Bowie Man

customer_reviews.title: My dad would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my retired father who loves golf. I've gotten him Pro-Vs probably 9 out of 10 past Christmases. I don't know why I bother wrapping them because he immediately knows what it is and is always excited about it. My dad would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Got shorted golf balls I paid fair price for. dozen $47.99 for 12 golf balls and get 9 a day late
customer_reviews.text: I just got my pro v1x golf balls and only got 3 sleeves!! And they were a day late!!! Guess what the tourney started today. Thanks a lot!! Are u kidding me??? 3 sleeves
customer_reviews.author: Baddman44

customer_reviews.title: Fake or used balls
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to believe that other people are correct. They are fakes! No shrink wrap. The box was taped shut and that was broken. The ball numbers were not the same in each sleeve, which seems odd to me. The sleeves had 1s and 2s mixed. The sleeves all look like they were opened before they got to me. Some of the balls felf like there are scuffs from use. I'm going with fakes all the way. At $47 per dozen not cool. Don't but check the reviews first.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hafterson

customer_reviews.title: Finally in yellow!
customer_reviews.text: I can see yellow golf balls so much easier than white or any other color. For quite awhile I had to give up my Pro V1 balls because they only came in white. I am back to playing Pro V1 with the new yellow color. They have the same great traits of the white Pro V1, but are easier to see. I bought enough to get me through the winter, but will be stocking up when spring arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Good ball not great value
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, Titleist make good golf balls. The Pro V1 is a solid ball, especially around the greens but compared to other balls which are a fraction of the cost it is difficult to say the extra money spent on their balls delivers more value. It doesn't. You can get as much zip, feel and distance from Pinnacle balls which are manufactured by the same company (Acushnet).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Davis

customer_reviews.title: A gentleman scholar who wanted Pinker ProV1s
customer_reviews.text: When a gentleman like myself looses a bet for a box of ProV1s he has to dig deep to figure how to feel better his loss. Rather than doing something as underhandedly as paying in refurbished ProVs from Walmart, this clever guy says ‘I will just send him a box of pink balls.’ This will provide some measure of solace as $50 flies out of the bank account. The problem with my purchase is these balls are not pink... they have pink lettering. The recipient confirmed that this is a well done golf ball. See what I did there?
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed buyer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boss bday and was disappointed to notice that the tape on the side of the box has been already cut off. Has this been used?! Would have returned it if the bday wasn’t in 2 days. Besides this issue, the product is as described.
customer_reviews.author: daisy v.

customer_reviews.title: Best golf balls ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my husbands favorite golf balls.. he golfs every weekend all year round is a major golfer.. and he loves these balls.. he only golfs with these balls.. and the pink stamp ones were a fun pack to buy.. I wish they made these balls in different colors other than white and yellow.. but the pink stamp logo on these were fun.. he enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Allys0nn

customer_reviews.title: NOT BRAND NEW
customer_reviews.text: The box that I got was scratched up. Someone had previously put scotch tape on the package and one of the balls inside was scuffed like it had already been played. It seems like this was a return that no one cared to even check to see the condition on. Super disappointed these were supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McGraw

customer_reviews.title: My husband's favorite golf balls
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a (very good) golfer and always puts these on his Christmas wish list because they are pricier but worth the money. He loves playing with these and will choose these over any other brand any day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P

customer_reviews.title: the real thing - from authentic artisans in the Southwest
customer_reviews.text: I love these little earrings - I don't need to take them out and I have a dash of color. They summon memories of all the beautiful places I've seen in the Southwest. They are made with care and intention. I've bought several more pair.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves em
customer_reviews.text: Hubby must lose a lot of balls. He put 5 boxes of these on his Christmas list. He says they’re his favs. I don’t know about durability- ask a golfer. Maybe they go in the pond or the weeds. I don’t know and I’m not askin. Just sayin...
customer_reviews.author: Robin N.

customer_reviews.title: Hubby’s fave!
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s All-Time favorite ball. Perfect for holidays and birthdays for him. It’s nice to be able to just order and get it delivered rather than have to go to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi 42

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law is an avid golfer; these are his favorite. I bought them here for $10 less than in the local sporting goods store. Plus no S/H and I didn't have to go get them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Great golf ball. It’s got range, spin, and a good feel. However, if your an amateur and starting out, DO NOT buy these. This ball is designed to spin more than most golf balls. Smaller dimple patterns to shape the shots more aggressively with the pro v1. In essence: new? Returning? Have a slice? Prepare to buy two boxes because these are not forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Ball
customer_reviews.text: While this is my favorite golf ball, especially for control around the green, it seems to bother me more losing it than it would, say, a Top Flite. Odd.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every available golf ball for the last 50 years of play. Expensive, but I consider them to be the best ball on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: No need to read this. Either you're buying these because you know what they are or you're here on accident. Don't waste your money if you have to buy more balls on the back 9 because you lost them all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in box.
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived and it was very obvious that it had been returned by someone else. Seal was broken and one of the sleeves of balls had been opened and the sleeve box end was mangled. I am so tired of buying products returned by other people. These balls are a gift for my 85 year old father and I wanted better for him. Should have supported my local golf shop.
customer_reviews.author: annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Got it cheaper on amazon, same quality as when purchased in store. It was a gift to an avid golfer that already likes this item.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Quality ball for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother-in-law so I don't have any idea of they are better than any other ball..... they're round and white. ;)
customer_reviews.author: nikboom

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: Nice Pro V1's. Gift recipient hits these a little further into to woods than he did with previous brand of balls.
customer_reviews.author: kenc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These came in one day! They are exactly what I wanted and expected. Hope they will do something great for my drive!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Open outer and inner boxs
customer_reviews.text: Not a good value, packages came open box outer and inner box's, exterior looked worn. Not packaged correct not sure they are real.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best balls
customer_reviews.text: Received the balls the same day I ordered them. Top notch service. Best golf ball in the business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: These were gifts for my sons. They were very pleased, which makes me very happy! The durability will depend on whether or not they manage to hit them strait and not lose them!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Hiscock

customer_reviews.title: The amazon order was not handed to me as reported on the Order website
customer_reviews.text: Golf balls are great. BUT The amazon order was not handed to me as reported on the Order website
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great golf ball.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic golf balls. I enjoy hitting them off the tee, fairways, & putting green. Great all around golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Now I need to stop hitting them so well in the wrong direction so I dont lose them
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. He prefers these golf balls and uses them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If only...
customer_reviews.text: If only my game was as good as these balls. Oh well, I still love playing them. This order was exactly as advertised and delivered in a timely manner. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hohman

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!!!
customer_reviews.text: Give me another 10-50 yards of rolls. I bought yellow and I can find it right away.
customer_reviews.author: mely71212

customer_reviews.title: A Golfers Choice
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested this specific golf ball and it is his current favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn R. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for an avid golfer who was pleased with the item.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great compliment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother. He felt these were top of the line!
customer_reviews.author: Proud Mom of the Bride.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase golf balls for my husband every Christmas. He only likes the Titlest Pro V1s. They are the perfect gift for an avid golfer!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: Our boys are thrilled with these golf balls and they are picky!
customer_reviews.author: kkferb

customer_reviews.title: Golfers top golf balls to use!
customer_reviews.text: My dads a golfer. He has a tournament coming up in April. He specifically asked for these golf balls. He says their the best!
customer_reviews.author: Shee

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift was advised 9 were cracked and defective!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Carpentier

customer_reviews.title: Distance in the Air, roll great on Ground!
customer_reviews.text: My bro-law will love these for Christmas! His wife stated that these are his favorite! Air & a good roll!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Gifted these balls
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my father Inlaw, he loves golf and these balls he talks about how “this is all he’s likes to shoot”
customer_reviews.author: Mattman1147

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find
customer_reviews.text: Still suck at golf, but hey... At least these golf balls are cool. Recommend the yellow ones if you tend to shank the ball as it is easier to find in the rough.
customer_reviews.author: Arkay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked them, lost them all. Not going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: brooks gursky

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, these balls are NOT pink
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and paid these crazy high prices for Pro V1 pink balls, they are not pink. They have tiny pink lettering. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: Always trying not to be straighy
customer_reviews.text: I keep slicing but everyone saying it’s my swing. Probably the balls though.
customer_reviews.author: Ellizabeth Evans

customer_reviews.title: Best golf balls I know of
customer_reviews.text: Best golf balls out there. The price tag is a little high, but you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These balls are great!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are really good! Just how balls should be.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha De Castro-Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as gifts to family members - ALWAYS a pleaser!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf balls
customer_reviews.text: These are great for use or for a gift everybody that plays likes them
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Better value than at sporting goods stores.
customer_reviews.text: A Pro-V is a Pro-V. They are less price here. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: His favorite
customer_reviews.text: The only golf ball my husband ever asks for so Pro V1 it is!
customer_reviews.author: REGINA

customer_reviews.title: Buy now
customer_reviews.text: Best golf ball on the market, no question. Real deal genuine product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son wanted! The perfect ball for the aspiring golfer!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for better players.
customer_reviews.text: High performance golf ball with good distance and very consistent control and spin. On a level of its own around the greens. Pricey, but it's the best ball on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Golf ball sleeves and case damaged
customer_reviews.text: The sleeves and case were significantly damaged. Not sure if the balls are authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Pro V1 Box was Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The Pro V1 box was damaged. This was a Christmas gift so very embarrassing because it looks used. There was a tear on on corner of the box and the other corners were beat up. Very disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer19

customer_reviews.title: Mehh.
customer_reviews.text: Too clicky for me. Prefer 1x and even DT Trusoft.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf balls
customer_reviews.text: If you want good golf balls, you have to pay for it. These have a great feel when you hit them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: Recipient liked them!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave them to my son and they were a hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball available
customer_reviews.text: I've played with Pro V1's for years. No other ball really compares in terms of quality. Rather expensive, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joseph Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Once you try these you won’t want to use any orhers
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: sent wrong package
customer_reviews.text: they sent me low numbers instead of high numbers. also sent me pink highlights (numbers and labeling) ... and pink is just not my color. It's still a Prov1, so it's fine ... but fulfillment of my order is not good.
customer_reviews.author: avid golfer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve got some nice BALLS!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing feels as good as a ProV1. You get what you pay for. I’ve tried others but keep going back to my standard of excellence.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Player

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ball for a price cheaper than the box store .
customer_reviews.author: william morrell

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t purchase pre used balls but that’s what was received
customer_reviews.text: Box came opened. A couple of balls looked like they’ve maybe been played before. One of the boxes was clearly preopened. Pretty embarrassed to gift this.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon poor shipping quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but Amazon did a poor job in protecting the product. The box was damaged and smashed.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis l payne

customer_reviews.title: won't show up in good to condition
customer_reviews.text: This was expose to be a Christmas gift and I don't have time to return it. It looks horrible.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence p.

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE THEY GET USED
customer_reviews.text: GOT THESE FOR MY PRINCESS BOYFRIEND. I GET TO WATCH THEM SIT ON A SHELF UNTIL THE END OF TIME BECAUSE HE DOESN'T WANT TO LOSE THEM. COOL.
customer_reviews.author: monica longisland

customer_reviews.title: Requested often
customer_reviews.text: These are a repeated requested gift from my son. These are his favorite golf balls, so I am assuming they are good. I am not a golfer, so cannot submit a personal opinion
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Can’t switch. Too good.
customer_reviews.text: It is consistently long, great feel I’ve tried others from TM, Bridgestone, and Srixon but always come back to Titleist.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find.
customer_reviews.text: This product preformed as promised and I like the yellow color makes them easier to find.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these golf balls. I get them every year for my husband’s birthday because he LOVES the pink numbers!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Fan fav
customer_reviews.text: Fan favorite golf ball, always a good choice for an experienced golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Titleist Golf Ball
customer_reviews.text: Same great ball, prior season, but who cares. A better price point than full price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Fore!
customer_reviews.text: ProV1’s are the best golf ball for me. Love overnight delivery
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Box ripped and Golf Balls Look Used
customer_reviews.text: The box was ripped and the golf balls looked used. I am wondering if someone returned these and then they were sent to me. Highly disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rasinar

customer_reviews.title: Nice distance with great greenside control.
customer_reviews.text: Best ball on the market...lots of imitators but only one Pro V1.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf balls
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were a little cheaper but very good

customer_reviews.title: Easy access
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a friend he seemed real pleased now I want to get him some personalized balls

customer_reviews.title: Good distance and spin
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but provides good roll and spin (when hit correctly)
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTiemeier

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great ball
customer_reviews.text: Tried them all and we now have a winner winner chicken dinner.

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like it was used
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed like it was used and returned. Balls were new
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: others don't pick them up 2 fairways over as much as black printed ProVI's
customer_reviews.text: just need a swing to match these balls performance, ps. they don't float

customer_reviews.title: Let down...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one dozen golf balls (4 sleeves), upon arrival I only received 3 sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Go to gift for my adult son who loves to golf like a pro!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Gates

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: i had a gift card and product was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Spin is good and goe for a good distance .
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Roff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These balls never let me down. A well rounded value!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Best golf ball on the market and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard for golf balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls have a pop like no other when I’m out on the course. I tried cheaper balls but the spring built into these pro v1s is beyond compare. I find it amazing that I notice the difference and I’m not even a serious golfer - it’s THAT obvious.
customer_reviews.author: engk916

customer_reviews.title: DIstance
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a gift but have used them before and they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: FM3

customer_reviews.title: Hey it's a Titleist Pro V1
customer_reviews.text: Can't really say much except it is the best all-around performing golf ball I've used. Feels great and the results are predictable.
customer_reviews.author: TW

product_meta.title: Titleist Pro V1 Golf Balls (One Dozen)
feature_bullets: Very low long game spin and penetrating trajectory
The Package Weight Of The Product Is 36 Pounds
